thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: I really love White Mountain puzzles! They have such a great variety of puzzles and are always adding more - I have a long wish list already! Shipping is pretty quick - I placed an order and received my puzzles within a week. I can't wait to finish these puzzles and order some more; thank you White Mountain!
